conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;No violation of Art. 3 (substantive aspect);Violation of Art. 5-1;Violation of Art. 5-5;Violation of Art. 8;Non-pecuniary damage - award
docname: CASE OF BORIS POPOV v. RUSSIA
